volunteer_experience.info: Microsoft Student Ambassadors are a global group of on-campus ambassadors who are eager to help fellow students, lead in their local tech community, and develop technical and career skills for the future. This program enhances students’ employability by offering training in skills not usually taught in academia, including knowledge of Microsoft technologies.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Microsoft Learn Student Ambassadors
volunteer_experience.title: Microsoft Learn Student Ambassador (Beta)

volunteer_experience.info: Tech For Good aims to bridge the gender gap in technology by training 50,000 women with tech education programs by 2025. Girls x Tech is a part of Tech For Good now!

publications: [{"title":"Telemedicine: An application of cloud computing","subtitle":"Recent Trends in Communication and Electronics","date":"June 30, 2021","description":"Cloud Computing is part of the ongoing digital revolution and has found its application in many fields. One such domain is Telemedicine in Healthcare. Providing instant and quality medical services at any time irrespective of patient’s location to everyone is the aim of any healthcare industry. To realize this goal telemedicine is playing a crucial role. But there are many challenges that continue to impede the growth of Telehealth services. Moreover, Telemedicine is not a new concept but it has only recently seen to gain popularity with improvement in the IT industry and adoption of cloud computing. It is not wrong to say cloud computing is the key for Telemedicine to effectively get utilized. This article briefly presents what is Telemedicine and how Cloud Computing has impacted it to boost its popularity. The importance, benefits, challenges and statistics of people adopting the services of Telemedicine is also …"}]
projects: [{"title":"Sankhya | Mental Maths Quiz Website","start_date":"Mar 2021","end_date":"Mar 2021","description":"It is a mental math quiz website made using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Here, the task is simple that when a user presses the start button then he/she needs to solve as many questions as possible within the given time limit."},{"title":"Corona Catch | Game Written in Python","start_date":"Jul 2020","end_date":"Jul 2020","description":"This is a game in which you have to shoot as many Coronavirus as possible that are falling on the ground before they touch the grey line on the screen. It is written in Python using Pygame module."},{"title":"Amivents | College Club Information | Android Application","start_date":"Apr 2020","end_date":"May 2020","description":"It is an android application written in Java that users can use to view information about any club in their college, find its social handle, contact address, or events the club is hosting or has hosted."}]
